divs: Sighting DetailsI stepped out for a smoke about 2140 Hrs. Noticed an extremly bright light about in path to the east of my postion next to orin belt star location. It had red, green , and white lights on top of it. took a slow path to the north, the stopped. remaided in place for over two hours. Snapped five photos at two diffent times. Object is still hovering in same place at this time. Current time is 2225 hrs. Noticed stars and moved with axis of earth. But object has stayed in current loction without moving with the axis of the earth.
Summary: bright ,hovering , pulsting lights, one plance for long amount of time
Object Shape: Disc, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Other, Unknown
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around January 5th 2012
